title: AIML - Machine Learning Engineer (On-Device Machine Learning), Machine Learning Platform and Infrastructure
summary: Apple’s machine learning framework (Core ML) is looking for an exceptional software engineer to expand and support its suite of ML frameworks. In this highly collaborative role, you will be at the center of multiple efforts to make ML an accessible and powerful tool for all developers.
description: You will develop, maintain and support Apple’s ML frameworks and tools. You will have the opportunity to work cross-functionally with many teams at Apple and impact a number of technologies.
key_qualifications: Strong and proven software development skills, Passion for software architecture, API design and developer experience, Experience with and knowledge of a variety of machine learning libraries/packages, Exceptional verbal and written communication skills, Experience with Apple’s development tools, languages (e.g. Swift), SDK, and app development is a big plus
education_experience:
BS/MS/PhD in Computer Science or Electrical Engineering
Solid industry experience (3+ years)
additional_requirements: Apple’s most important resource, our soul, is our people. Apple benefits help further the well-being of our employees and their families in meaningful ways. No matter where you work at Apple, you can take advantage of our health and wellness resources and time-away programs.
pay_benefits: At Apple, base pay is one part of our total compensation package and is determined within a range. This provides the opportunity to progress as you grow and develop within a role. The base pay range for this role is between $166,600 and $296,300, and your base pay will depend on your skills, qualifications, experience, and location.
